caption.text: disk diffusion method using CLSI guidelines (PIP/TAZ-Piperacillin Tazobactam, CEF-Ceftazidime, MER-Meropenem, GEN-Gentamicin, CIP-Ciprofloxacin) (R-resistant; S- susceptible; I- Intermediate), Zone diameter interpretive criteria in mm according to CLSI guidelines (PIP/TAZ- ≥21 (S), 15–20 (I), ≤14 (R) ; CEF- ≥18 (S), 15–17 (I), ≤14 (R) ; MER- ≥19 (S), 16–18 (I), ≤15 (R) ; GEN- ≥15 (S), 13–14 (I), ≤12 (R) ; CIP- ≥21 (S), 16–20 (I), ≤15 (R)).

statement.text: PIP/TAZ will be unique diameter for both Isolates.
CIP will have Low diameter for VIT PC CL-7 Isolates.
All the diameter value is unique for both the Isolates except CEF.
PIP/TAZ will be same for both the Isolates.
